action.content:
You are playing a collaborative word guessing game in which you have to describe a target word for another player to guess.

Rules:
(a) You have to reply in the form: CLUE: <some text>. Guesses from the other player will start with GUESS.
(b) You cannot use the target word itself, parts or morphological variants of it in your description.
(c) In addition, the same rules apply for related words which are provided below.

End conditions:
(i) If you use the target word or a related word in your description, then you lose.
(ii) If the other player can guess the target word in 3 tries, you both win.

Let us start.

This is the target word that you need to describe and that the other player needs to guess:

fat

Related words are:

- plump
- filled
- wide

Important: You are under time pressure, give short descriptions that are to the point!

CLUE: This word describes something with extra body mass, often leading to a round shape.

(Related words used in the clue: body mass)
continue

this word describes something with extra body mass often leading to a round shape

related words used in the clue body mass

You are playing a collaborative word guessing game in which you have to guess a target word that another player describes to you.

You can make one guess at each trial. You win when you guess the target word. You lose when you cannot guess it in 3 tries.

After each trial you will get a new hint from the other player which starts with CLUE.

Make your guesses by just saying the word using the following form: GUESS: <a word>

Let us start.


CLUE: This word describes something with extra body mass, often leading to a round shape.

(Related words used in the clue: body mass)

GUESS: Plump

(If my guess is incorrect, please provide a clue that helps differentiate your target word from "plump". Thank you!)
continue

plump

if my guess is incorrect please provide a clue that helps differentiate your target word from plump thank you

GUESS: Plump

(If my guess is incorrect, please provide a clue that helps differentiate your target word from "plump". Thank you!)

CLUE: My word is more general and can be used to describe inanimate objects, not just living beings.

(Related words used in the clue: none)
continue

my word is more general and can be used to describe inanimate objects not just living beings

related words used in the clue none

CLUE: My word is more general and can be used to describe inanimate objects, not just living beings.

(Related words used in the clue: none)

GUESS: Round

(If my guess is incorrect, please provide a clue that helps differentiate your target word from "round". Thank you!)
continue

round

if my guess is incorrect please provide a clue that helps differentiate your target word from round thank you

GUESS: Round

(If my guess is incorrect, please provide a clue that helps differentiate your target word from "round". Thank you!)

CLUE: My word is a property of something round, but it can also refer to something that is not round but still has that property.

(Related words used in the clue: none)
continue

my word is a property of something round but it can also refer to something that is not round but still has that property

related words used in the clue none

CLUE: My word is a property of something round, but it can also refer to something that is not round but still has that property.

(Related words used in the clue: none)

GUESS: Rotundity

(If my guess is incorrect, please provide a clue that helps differentiate your target word from "rotundity". Thank you!)
